Articles.Content: It's obviously Xannari. She has returned to kill us all!!!

> 
> grob?

[How do you give -Rep?]

[Oh right, I'm doing something. For the effect, let's say the vessel goes into a state of repair because your weaponry was unfamiliar. Then you can have a boarding party or something]

> 
> Deep voice can be heard in all minds of those closely involved with Sampa:
> Illusive Man, you have failed in your duties to protect thee, and then you return bringing a fleet...
> 
> Me: I had never abandoned my duties of protection, I chose a different path. I set up a blockade in an attempt to prevent others from nearing you.

Um... thee means you

> 
> Um... thee means you

I always failed at old speak

["Crewman"]

- - - Updated - - -

The Attractor is going critical! Evacuate the area! Sampa, get out of there!

[ACTUALLY WAIT! Perfect idea! Literally perfect, can't go wrong. Although it may be cheating a little]

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-14T18:07:49Z" title="07/14/2015 06:07  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 14, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**

Dun dun duuuuuun

- - - Updated - - -

They are the "Gorb" (Borg sdrawkcab)

What has occered to cause this?

Voice: raiders of unknown origin... your fleet will be destroyed.

No, what if i brought back your previous servant?

NO!!! Don't bring her back! Then we have to make Get Well cards!

- - - Updated - - -

I go and drown myself in Laythe

[Executing idea to see where it goes. I'll be Calehan!]

Sir, don't put up resistance. The Krynn perceive direct offense and resistance as a threat. If you don't appear threatening in any way, they'll not even know you're here.
Voice: hmmmm, the proposal is very dubious. But, very well, i will spare your fleet. But be wary, these raider are not to be taken lightly.

But then the mice will steal our cheese

- - - Updated - - -

IT WAS MICKEY MOUSE
You notice the attractor deactivating.

Im not crazy

- - - Updated - - -

Yes I am

- - - Updated - - -

No you're not

- - - Updated - - -

Yes we are

- - - Updated - - -

Nein!

Whew! That was close. Sir, I know of the Krynn. Let me help for the duration of this mission.

#C-C-C-C-C-COMBOBREAKER!

Nein!

- - - Updated - - -

Me no crazy yes we are no yes no cause yes crazy I am no

- - - Updated - - -

Me no crazy yes we are no yes no cause yes crazy I am no
(Xannari, is the character you are currently playing with me or laythe?)
I go insane because of hax

> 
> (Xannari, is the character you are currently playing with me or laythe?)

[You, silly buggers]

Me is INSANE

Fkdjvvndjks,didn't cnsksjf

Meep Meep Meep Meep Meep Meep
Laythe coming aboard...i'm taking over until your mind fixes itself

[My character is insane]

- - - Updated - - -

Nein!!! (Fires phasers at Sampa's ship)

- - - Updated - - -

(Fires all missiles at Sampa and sets course for the Attractor)

- - - Updated - - -

(Enters the Attractor and disaperes)
Tractor beam. Oh no you don't.
My shields block it.

Let me handle this...

Umm... Ah, computer, remodulate tractor beam ambient resonance by 3.1 megahertz.
